review.comment: I have tried other prepared meal companies and while the food was good the meals tended to have no life of their own, they all tasted the same. My Senior Management team all order from here and convinced me to give them a try. They assured me they were not like the others and boy were they right. I have enjoyed each meal immensely and love the distinct flavors in each meal. They help keep me engaged and on track for the week.
review.review_reply: This is so great to hear! Thank you so much for sharing and for your business!

review.comment:
I ordered chef b meals as a temporary help in time of need as a MOB preparing for my daughters wedding and it may have been the best decision I’ve made in a long time.
Service is EXCELLENT, food is delicious, nutritious and just right~ not too much, not too little, not too fancy and not too simple! And the BEST thing about them imo is that they are not too SALTY or over spiced!!!!
They may become a permanent thing in our house!
Thank you Chef b and the team!
review.review_reply: Wow! We are grateful we were able to help our during such a busy time! Thank you so much for the compliments!!

review.comment: We recently discovered Meals  by Chef B and we  are so glad we did! The meals are fresh and delicious.  There are many healthy options.   The ordering and pick up process is very  easy.   Makala  is extremely friendly and helpful! We look  forward to tasting more of yummy food!
review.review_reply: Thank you Felice! We are so happy you’re enjoying every part of our process. Thank you for your business.

review.comment: This is the perfect meal plan for me. I can be healthy if I want to or not :). Plenty of healthy choices yet also comfort foods etc. I have saved a ton of money on take out. I highly recommend Chef B!
review.review_reply: Thank you Christine! We love that we can save you  money and feed you no matter your mood! 👏🏻

review.comment: Love the meals and variety. I also like that I can pick up or deliver!
review.review_reply: Thank you!! We appreciate your business.
Thank you!

review.comment: The meals are super tasty and there are a lot of good low calorie options.
review.review_reply: Thank you! We appreciate your business!

review.comment: Great service & awesome food!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much!

review.comment: I’ve ordered from many other Meal services and Meals by Chef B is by far the best! Not only is the food restaurant quality but you have so many choices and the customer service is amazing! I would highly recommend them…a great value!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much!!! We are honored to serve you!

review.comment:
This is my new favorite food service. I have been looking for a good service for years and have tried some of the local options and wasn’t satisfied with any of them. Well, my sister found Meals by Chef B and gave me a gift card from Christmas. It was one of the best gifts that I’ve ever received.

It’s been a month that I’ve been ordering from Chef B and I have to say I am a fan. From the delicious chicken dishes, the keto alternatives, and my favorites, the chicken enchiladas, all the menu items have been fantastic. I love that the food is not salty as many places I have tried, things are well-seasoned and they are flavorful. I’ve been ordering the lunch portions and they are more than enough for a lunch or dinner. There hasn’t been an item that I haven’t liked! All meals have their macros and reheating instructions on the lid, which is so cool as I’m trying to watch what I eat. Another great aspect is their service, the communication they keep via text messaging and email is super! Any issues or changes, I can text and I get a response quickly and it feels like I’m texting with a friend, no awkward scripted service messages! Also, the driver that delivers my meals on Sundays is super nice, I can tell she’s smiling even through the mask! As you can tell, I really like this service and would recommend to anyone looking for an alternative to cooking daily or options to mix things up meal-wise. 100% Recommended!
review.review_reply: Wow! Thank you Jose for taking the time to share your feedback. We are so thankful and appreciative. Chef is so pleased you are enjoying his menu selections and creations. We hope to continue our weekly relationship for a long time coming🙏🏼👨🏻‍🍳

review.comment: This is a great food delivery option. Great service, great food and lots of different selections each week catering to many different dietary needs. Home delivery is available and has yet to disappoint. On time and order always correct. The crab cakes were a very tasty option this week.
review.review_reply: Thank you Amy! We appreciate your ongoing long time loyalty! ❣️

review.comment:
Very easy, just microwaved

The steak was tender, melts in your mouth

Great flavors!
review.review_reply: Perfect! Thank you!
Thank you!

review.comment: Finally a meal prep service that uses high quality ingredients! By far the best meal delivery service in the area and at a very competitive price with the popular brand name services that use sub par ingredients. Haven’t had anything that isn’t delicious yet. Highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Thank you Max! So great to hear. We love when our clients taste the quality in our selection of ingredients. 👏🏻

review.comment: I am really enjoying the lunches. The large selection of meals is great, portions are really good and the taste is top shelf.
review.review_reply: Thank you Steven! We appreciate your business!

review.comment: Great food that is prepared perfectly and lasts long.

review.comment: Great food and amazing customer service!

review.comment: After a few unsuccessful attempts with commercial main stream meal service programs due to the poor quality of food they provide, I came across Meals By Chef B on google and decided to give them a try.  I’m glad I found them. The food he provides not only tastes fantastic, it’s authentic, fresh, and exactly to my liking. His service is everything you could ask for in a meal service program. If you’re looking for some help in the kitchen, look no further then Meals By Chef B !
review.review_reply: Thank you Alex! What amazing compliments. We really appreciate it!!!

review.comment: I have tried probably eight different meal prep companies. I have used Meals By Chef B dozens of times and am thrilled every single time. The meals are fresh, tasty, and clean. The portion sizes and macros are accurate. The pricing is fair. PLUS the staff is always so kind, you can really tell they go above and beyond. I can't praise them enough!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Isabella! We really appreciate your compliment and your ongoing business ❣️

review.comment: My family has been ordering for around two years. Best customer service around!! Lots of choices from low carb to comfort food and portion size choices too. The food is always fresh and delicious. Easy re-heat instructions. They only use top quality ingredients. 5stars for Chef B
review.review_reply: Thank you Gus! We greatly appreciate your business!

review.comment: I started ordering from meals by chef B a few months ago. Sometimes I order for myself and sometimes for my kids also. My older son loves the salmon and my younger son loves the brownies 😄. I love that the food is made fresh and local. No freeze dried meals anymore for me. The convenience of different portion sizes is great for me because I work some evening hours so I often eat a lunch size and a kids size a few hours apart. I can order low carb or comfort. The variety is amazing. Everything is delicious. The best part is their customer service. Five star all the way!!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Susan!!! We truly appreciate your business!! Thank you for appreciating our business model! Means so much to us as a small business! You are considered Chef B family now as a regular!!

review.comment:
Had the French Onion Mushroom Swiss Chicken with Sweet Potatoes last night for dinner. It was just delicious but sadly, there were no leftovers. We will have to order 4 of this dish next time.

Compliments to Chef B
review.review_reply: A classic favorite! So happy you enjoyed it! We are grateful for your business!

review.comment: The food is amazing .. pretty sure I am never cooking again 😉 I love how perfect the portion sizes are and it has the nutritional value right on the container. Great company .. great people.. Gove it a try you will be glad you did.
review.review_reply: We love this! Thank you so much for the compliment! We appreciate your business!

review.comment:
So glad I found Meals by Chef B!
I have been impressed so far! Meals are delicious & reasonably priced. Chef B has been helpful with answering any questions I have. Highly recommend
review.review_reply: Thank you Lexi! We appreciate you giving us a shot!

review.comment: I love love the meal plans!! The process is seamless to order and you are not committed to ordering every week.  The day before delivery they give you a window of when the meals will be delivered and you can track how far they are from your location the day of delivery!   Best service ever!! I rate Chef B 10 Stars!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much! We are grateful for your business!

review.comment: Everything was delicious.   It made my life so easy  ot trying to figure out what to cook.

review.comment: Oh my goodness, guys! These meals are AMAZING! I had not heard of Chef B until my kids school held a fundraiser and let me tell you, GO TRY THEM! I love that you can track all of the nutritional facts and you know what you are eating. The meals are delicious and a great size. I have a new found love for cauliflower in Chef B’s Cauliflower mac n cheese and his chopped brisket is to die for! SO good! Go! GO NOW! So yummy!
review.review_reply: You’re so sweet!!! Thank you so much for supporting the school fundraiser and for the praise. Chef is so happy to hear you’re pleased!

review.comment:
I have had an amazing experience ordering from
meals by Chef B! The food is incredible and the delivery team is professional. The value of the quality of the food cannot be best. Best gift ever for a new mom!

review.comment: Chef B’s food is some of the best I’ve had. The best thing is the variety of meals you can choose. I started with ordering meals for me. My husband and kids ate all of my stuff! I have some very picky eaters so I was happy to see them eating. The quality and portion sizes are so helpful. I’m so glad that I found this service.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Tonya! We are so grateful to serve your family and pass the picky test!! Such a mom win!

review.comment: Chef b makes delicious clean food high quality you're going to love it!

review.comment:
Food Here is High Quality with a large number of very healthy selections. I love the meal prep offerings because it is a task i just don't love doing myself, the prices are reasonable for the quantity and everything is fresh. Delivery is convenient I just pick it up at Burn Boot Camp in Jupiter.
They also cook with healthy high quality avacado oils and offer gluten free choices.  Simply put Chef B is awesome - this makes me eat healthier and at home more often.
review.review_reply: Thank you Michelle! We are so happy you are enjoying our service! We are grateful for your business!

review.comment: Excellent meals, very clean shop, very customer friendly!

review.comment: Chef B was a missing solution for me and so many of my clients who want to have delicious healthy options but don't always have the time to prep. Their prepared snacks are SO yummy and use high quality ingredients, and their veggies are always fresh and made well! My boys love the garlic string beans and my personal fave is the zoodles. Thanks for making this such an easy option for mamas and families alike!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Jes! This is such a compliment coming from a nutritional coach of your caliber! We are so happy to serve you and your clients!
Thank you!

review.comment: The meals are absolutely delicious & pick up is so easy!! Very happy with Meals by Chef B!

Do yourself a favor and order some meals ASAP. The enchiladas and the beef stroganoff are hands down my favorite, I actually think about the enchiladas more than I care to admit! The food is so good and super easy to heat up. Thanks Chef B!
review.review_reply: Lol!!! That’s awesome! Thank you Jenna for your business and for loving on Chef’s dishes!
